name: Marble Blaster
description:
Classic ZUMA style game with countless levels.
Are you a super fan of Zuma games? If the answer is yes, Marble Blaster is the game that you must have.

How to play:
- Shoot to match colored marbles in group of 3 or more;
- Prevent marbles from reaching the end;
- More marbles, higher score;
- Create Combos to cause a chain reaction and earn bonus points.

This free version is supported by 3rd party ads. Ads may use internet connectivity, and therefore subsequent data charges may apply. The photos/media/files permission is required to allow the game to save game data to external storage, and is sometimes used to cache ads.


Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games....
